History of Mount Batur Volcano

Mount Batur is found in Batur town, Kintamani District, Bali, Indonesia. Mount Batur (Gunung Batur) is 1717 m above ocean level can be summit by physically fit climbers in around 2 hours. Mount Batur (Gunung Batur) is an element wellspring of fluid magma spotted at within two concentric calderas north west of Mount Agung, Bali, Indonesia. The south east side of the greater 10×13 km caldera contains a caldera lake. The inside 7.5 wide caldera, which was organized in the midst of emplacement of the Bali (or Ubud) ignimbrite, has been dated at around 23,670 and 28,500 years back. The southeast mass of the inward caldera lies underneath Lake Batur; Batur cone has been assembled inside the internal caldera to a tallness over the outer caldera edge. The Batur stratovolcano has conveyed vents over an extraordinary piece of the inside caldera, however a NE-SW crevice system has restricted the Batur I, II, and III pits along the summit edge. Obvious discharges have been depicted by tender to-direct dangerous activity occasionally joined by magma radiation. Basaltic magma streams from both summit and flank vents have arrived at the caldera floor and the shores of Lake Batur in true time. The caldera contains an element, 700-meter-tall stratovolcano rising above the surface of Lake Batur. The essential certainly filed emanation of Batur was in 1804, and it has been as frequently as would be prudent element from here on out. The noteworthy magma field from the 1968 launch is observable today when seen from Kintamani, a town that stradles the southwest edge of the more unmistakable calde. Historical activity at the volcano includes 25 mild to moderate strombolian eruptions, with lava flows in 1849, 1888, 1904, 1905, 1921, 1926, 1963, 1968 and 1974.

Interesting Adventure of Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour

When you want something different when filling your vacation on the island of Bali, and you also like trekking adventures, then Mount Batur sunrise trekking is a must for you to do, because it offers a very pleasant experience, where you can witness the beauty of the sunrise from above. Mount Batur, a sensation that you may rarely get anywhere else. Here you can see the beauty of Mount Batur and Lake Batur from this Mount Batur trekking view point. Accompanied by a professional trekking guide who will always guide you in enjoying this natural beauty, and help you if you want to take pictures with the background of Mount Batur at sunrise. Enjoy the breakfast that is prepared while enjoying the beautiful view of Mount Batur. If you are on vacation on the island of Bali, don't forget to do this Mount Batur sunrise trekking activity.

Option 1 : Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking

Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking start early morning around 02.00 am depend the area of your hotel stay, and afterward we directly go to starting point of mount batur sunrise trekking, after arrive at starting point of mount batur trekking, you will be welcome by our expert and amicable mount batur trekking guide, the guide will inform about the rule for trekking and will lend you flash light as your eye during the trekking, due in early morning is dark there, so need help with flash light to see the trekking trek. At that point you will begin appreciate the trekking for two hours to the top, after touch base at the top you will stunned with the perspective of the sunrise facing to mount batur. The trekking guide will plan breakfast for you (bread, steam bubbled egg and mineral water), Is awesome minute and uncommon experience you will have amid the trekking. After completion breakfast and take picture, we will going to finish point, after touch base at finish point, we will escort you back to your hotel stay with bring a brilliant memory during Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking.

Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour Program Itinerary :

  • 02.00 – pick up at your hotel (if in Ubud pick up is at 02.30 am)
  • 03.45 – Arrival at starting point, introduction and safety procedure briefing by our experience professional hiking guide
  • 04.00 – Begin our climb / trek to Mount Batur Bali.
  • 06.15 – Arrival at the summit crater, where we witness the spectacular view and sunrise. While there we enjoy refreshments of eggs boiled in volcanic steam.
  • 07.00 – Continue our trek around the entire crater and to finishing point of our trek.
  • 09.00 – Arrival at Finish Point
  • 09.30 – Back to hotel.
  • 11.30 – Arrival at your hotel.

Option 2 : Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking + Batur Natural Hot Spring

Mount Batur and Batur Hot Spring package is an adventure to climb Mount Batur and ends with bathing in Natural batur hot spring water, a very complete trekking adventure where after the body is sweating because of tiredness in climbing and soaking yourself to stretch your muscles in this hot spring. will make your body fresh again and ready to return to activity. The adventure starts in the morning where our tour driver will go to the hotel where you are staying to take you at the starting point of climbing Mount Batur, at the starting point you will be greeted by our Mount Batur trekking guide, by giving instructions on what to do and what not to do during this time. trekking and journey begins along the dark road that is only lit by moonlight will make the atmosphere pleasant. Arriving at the top you will see the expanse of Mount Batur which is so beautiful, enjoy the view of the sunrise here while eating breakfast in the form of bread and eggs, a short but very meaningful moment that will be your memory for a lifetime, after that proceed to the finish point, and go straight to the natural hotspring batur, here you will soak to refresh yourself, finished bathing proceed to take you back to the hotel with very impressive memories in the adventure of Mount Batur Trekking and Hotspring.

Option 3 : Mount Batur Sunrise Jeep 4x4 WD

Mount Batur Sunrise Jeep is an adventure that makes it easy for you to see the beauty of the sunrise on Mount Batur, by driving a 4x4 Jeep car to the view point from the sunrise view point you can see the majesty of the beauty of the sunrise here, a very special sight at all. in spending time during holidays on the island of Bali by doing activities to see the sunrise. This is an alternative solution for those of you who are not strong enough to climb but want to enjoy the beautiful view of the sunrise at the view point of Mount Batur. The tracks traversed by this jeep are different from those traversed by trekking as usual, because the trekking path that is on foot cannot be traversed by the 4x4 jeep because the terrain does not support it at all, so with a 4x4 jeep this tour will go through a completely different track and we did not reach the top as normal trekking arrived, but we went through a different route, which is a place that have view point that the jeep could pass with good location and best spot for see the amazing and beautiful sunrise view, and from here we could see the beauty of Mount Batur and Lake Batur which were very beautiful, enjoy the beautiful and spectacular sunrise view. very charming and see the incomparable beauty of nature during your holiday in Bali

Mount Batur Sunrise Jeep 4x4 WD Program

The program from Mount Batur sunrise jeep 4x4 starts in the morning where our tour driver picks you up in the morning at 03.00 am and if you live in Ubud, we pick you up at 03.30 am, after that go to the starting point of Mount Batur sunrise jeep. Arriving at the sunrise jeep you will make preparations and immediately ride a 4x4 Jeep car and go straight to the view point mount Batur sunrise, a very exciting trip, during the trip enjoying the beautiful scenery in the dark, until finally arriving at the view point mount Batur, the jeep will park in a good position and you can climb into the jeep and enjoy the sunrise view from the top of this 4 x4 jeep, enjoy the very beautiful scenery, the incomparably beautiful natural wonders, very suitable for couples who want to enjoy the sunrise with a partner, and hopefully can strengthen your relationship by enjoying this rare moment on the island of Bali. Finished enjoying the view of the sunrise, the journey continues to black lava, we will go around for a while in black lava and enjoy the beautiful scenery around which is very tempting and take pictures here with the background of Mount Batur, after that proceed to the finish point on the way to the finish point you will see the beautiful scenery around, arrive at the finish point you will rest first, and continue the journey to where you are staying by bringing a very impressive experience in this Mount Batur sunrise 4x4 jeep tour program

  • 05.00 – Begin the adventure of 4 x 4 Jeep Car

  • 06.30 – Continue our trek around the black lava

Option 4 : Mount Batur Sunrise Jeep 4x4 WD and Hot Spring

Mount Batur Sunrise Jeep 4x4 WD and Hot Spring Tour is an activity that combines two activities in one day, namely where you will ride a 4x4 jeep to see the beauty of the sunrise through a very beautiful and natural track, followed by enjoying a soak in the hot spring pool in Batur Natural Hot Spring, a combination tour that is very suitable for those of you who want to experience the beautiful sunrise on the island of Bali and the warm hot water in the hot spring. Firstly, our tour driver will pick you up at the place you are staying in the morning and go straight to the 4x4 jeep company to do the 4x4 jeep activity to see the sunrise, the track in the morning goes to the forest to the view point where you can see the sunrise with the backdrop of Mount Batur and lake Batur, and accompanied by breakfast makes the morning atmosphere very complete, after that we continue to the finish point via the black lava track until we get to the finish point, after that we will head to the Batur natural hot spring to enjoy soaking in the hot spring pool. It is believed to contain a lot of mineral content which is very good for the body for health. The pool is located on the edge of the lake, so while soaking you can see the enchanting beauty of Lake Batur. After soaking we will go to the hotel with a very impressive experience on the tour. one day to do Mt. Batur Sunrise Jeep and Hot Spring Tour, accompanied by an experienced driver will make this trip even more enjoyable
